column5: Whether to show the drop-down arrow
column7: true(for single select), false(for multiple select)
column9: Whether show search input in single mode
column25: Separator used to tokenize on tag and multiple mode
column33: Disable virtual scroll when set to false
column41: Called when select an option or input value change
column49: Called when an option is deselected, param is the selected option's value. Only called for multiple or tags, effective in multiple or tags mode only
column77: Callback function that is fired when input changed
column81: Called when an option is selected, the params are option's value (or key) and option instance
